about.bio: I am an experienced Android developer and interested in the latest technologies and trends.

I am studying computer engineering at Sarvajanik College of Engineering and Technology in Surat, India. During my studies, I am acquiring work experience in various fields and lately I am concentrating on software development on the Android platform.

I have in total over two and a half years of active Android development experience. I have worked on numerous applications used by many people. A social media for memes with meme creator is one of my best apps.

I am eager to constantly learn new things. At the moment, my focus is on the new Java 8 and 9 language features, RxJava and RxAndroid, Kotlin, architectural patterns on Android (MVVM, MVP, etc.) and of course I am always up for trying out the newest Android libraries.
For a comprehensive list of my work, please refer to my work page.
